Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Authorizes Kristin Proud to receive certain service credit with the New York state and local employees' retirement system
Summary: Authorizes Kristin Proud to receive certain service credit with the New York state and local employees' retirement system for her volunteer service beginning March 25, 2020 and ending November 8, 2020.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing Kristin Proud to receive certain service credit with the New York state and local employees' retirement system
